explains: n. 左撇子，惯用左手的人；左手投球；笨拙

sentences.en: He hammered the young left-hander in three straight sets.
sentences.cn: 他连胜3局，轻松击溃了这位年轻的左撇子选手。

sentences.en: What if he had been a left-hander?
sentences.cn: 如果他是一个左手球员？

sentences.en: Love at the left. But I'm not left-hander .
sentences.cn: 爱在左边，但我不是左撇子！
